item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://monroestainless.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
MONROE STAINLESS

Rostfri
bryggeriutrustning

MONROE STAINLESS köper och säljer rostfria produkter av hög kvalitet.
All vår utrustning är CE-märkt och vi kan producera allt rostfritt.


Utan dyr lager lagerhållning och att vi alltid försöker hitta bästa transportmöjligheterna
för att hålla ner kostnader för slutkund gör att vi kan leverera hög kvalitet till låg kostnad.

LÄS MER...
MONROE STAINLESS

Om oss

Av Bryggare

För bryggare!
Tillsammans med partners har vi sålt över 2000 jästankar, 500 bryggverk till mer än 600 kunder i över 70 länder på jordens alla kontinenter.

Dina behov i fokus

Vi skräddarsyr dina tankar och bryggverk efter dina lokaler utan extra kostnad. Vi kan även hjälpa till att ta fram ett komplett bryggeri med allt från maltkross till kylsystem. 

Samarbetspartners

Vi kan även hjälpa till med installation genom våra samarbetspartners om ni söker en turn-key lösning. 

Svenskt Bolag

Vi kan även hjälpa till med finansiering. Monroe Stainless Sweden är ett svenskt bolag med F-skatt och moms-registrering. 

VÅRA PRODUKTER

FRÅGOR & FUNDERINGAR

KONTAKTA OSS

Vi skräddarsyr dina tankar och bryggverk efter dina lokaler utan extra kostnad.
Vi kan även hjälpa till att ta fram ett komplett bryggeri med allt från maltkross till kylsystem.
All vår utrustning är CE-märkt.
KONTAKTA Oss

Partners:

varför MONROE STAINLESS

Monroe Stainless startades av före detta bryggare och är till för bryggare i huvudsak även om vi har tillverkat tankar för vin, mjölk, cider, mjöd – ja allt möjligt. Vi jobbar över hela världen med olika partners. Monroe Stainless Sweden har F-skatt, momsregistrering och kan hjälpa till med leasing/finansiering.

kontakt

För mer info, maila:
info@monroestainless.com

Försäljning Skandinaviska marknaden:
daniel@monroestainless.com

Försäljning utanför Skandinavien (outside Scandinavian market): 
arthur@monroestainless.com

item.title: produkter
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
våra produkter

MONROE STAINLESS

Monroe Stainless köper och säljer rostfria produkter av hög kvalitet. Vi kan producera allt rostfritt. Utan dyr lagerhållning och att vi alltid försöker hitta bästa transportmöjligheterna för att hålla ner kostnader för slutkund gör att vi kan leverera hög kvalitet till låg kostnad.
All vår utrustning är CE-märkt.

Monroe startades av bryggare och är först och främst för bryggare, tillsammans med partners har vi sålt över 2000 jästankar, 500 bryggverk till mer än 600 kunder som är en blandning av bryggerier, vingårdar och destillerier i över 70 länder på jordens alla kontinenter. Allt från 100L till 20 000L, manuellt eller full auto. 

Vi skräddarsyr dina tankar och bryggverk efter dina lokaler utan extra kostnad.
Vi kan även hjälpa till att ta fram ett komplett bryggeri med allt från maltkross till kylsystem. 

Genom våra samarbetspartners kan vi även hjälpa till med installation om ni söker en turn-key lösning.

Vi kan även hjälpa till med finansiering. Monroe Stainless Sweden är ett svenskt bolag med F-skatt och moms-registrering. 

”We can produce everything except nuclear weapons.”

Tankar

Vi kan producera trycktankar, jästankar, kombitankar, kolsyretankar, liggande tankar, serveringstankar, mjölktankar, tankar för vinjäsning – allt ni letar efter.

LÄS MER...
Bryggverk

Alla bryggverk levereras med dubbelt så stor HLT. Välj mellan el-patron eller ånga.
Välj mellan Siemens-PLC, full auto eller manuell styrning.

LÄS MER...
CIP

Helt i rostfritt och kraftiga pumpar kan vi producera 2 eller 3 kärls CIP-stationer, stationära eller på  hjul i kraftig konstruktion i alla storlekar. Manuell eller automatisk – du väljer själv.

LÄS MER...
Komplett Bryggeri

MONROE STAINLESS hjälper gärna till att ta fram ett helt bryggeri, vi har stor erfarenhet från att starta från scratch till att uppgradera befintlig bryggutrustning.

LÄS MER...
Tapputrustning

Burk, flaska, PET eller bag in box? Vi hjälper till med alla sorters tapputrustning i alla storlekar. Vi arbetar med erkända märken från USA, Kanada, Tyskland och Italien för att hitta precis din matchning.

LÄS MER...
Begagnat

Monroe både köper och säljer begagnad utrustning.


LÄS MER...

varför MONROE STAINLESS

item.title: tankar
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
TANKAR

[modula id="2678"]


Eftersom vi optimerar varje skeppning så är ofta våra tankar billigare än de begagnade som finns på svenska marknaden trots att vi levererar hög kvalitet.

Vi kan producera trycktankar, jästankar, kombitankar, kolsyretankar, liggande tankar, serveringstankar, mjölktankar, tankar för vinjäsning – allt ni letar efter.

  • CE-märkt
  • 30% extra headspace
  • Isolerade av polyurethane, 100mm
  • SU304, 3mm insida och 2mm utsida
  • CIP-boll
  • 60° konvinkel
  • Kylmantel med en eller två kylzoner beroende på tankstorlek
  • 4” humleport i toppen
  • Manlucka vid sidan eller på topp
  • Arbetstryck: 2 bar

Ingår:
Våra jästankar kommer kompletta, passiviserade och redo att användas. Kolsyresten, vridbar rackingarm, justerbar spund-ventil, övertrycksventil, provventil och magnetventil (solenoid) till kylmedia.

Vi kan bygga tankar smalare, bredare, högre, lägre för att passa dina lokaler och behov.
Vikt och mått finns i diagrammen på varje tank.

item.title: home_eng
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
MONROE STAINLESS

Stainless
Brewery Equipment

MONROE STAINLESS buys and sells high quality stainless steel products.
All our equipment is CE marked and we can produce everything stainless.

MONROE STAINLESS is a Swedish company but we do deliver our products outside Sweden.
We will help and cover customs and shipment to your doorstep.

READ MORE...
MONROE STAINLESS

About us

By brewers

for Brewers!
Together with partners, we have sold over 2,000 yeast tanks and 500 brewhouse to more than 600 customers in over a 70 countries all over the world.

Your needs in focus

We make your tanks and breweries with your premises at no extra cost. We can also help to develop a complete brewery with everything from malt crusher to cooling system.

Partners

We can also help with installation through our partners if you are looking for a turn-key solution.

Swedish company

We can also help with financing. Monroe Stainless Sweden is a Swedish company with F-tax and VAT registration.

OUR PRODUCTS

QUESTIONS?

CONTACT US

We make your tanks and breweries with your premises at no extra cost. We can also help to develop a complete brewery with everything from malt crusher to cooling system.
All our equipment is CE marked.
CONTACT US

why MONROE STAINLESS

Monroe Stainless was started by former brewers and is for brewers mainly, although we have manufactured tanks for wine, milk, cider, mead – everything possible. We work all over the world with different partners. Monroe Stainless Sweden has F-tax, VAT registration and can help with leasing / financing.

item.title: products_eng
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
our products

MONROE STAINLESS

Monroe Stainless buys and sells high quality stainless steel products. We can produce everything stainless.
Without expensive warehousing and the fact that we always try to find the best transport options to keep costs down for the end customer, we can deliver high quality products at low cost.
All our equipment is CE marked.

Monroe was started by brewers and is primarily for brewers, together with partners we have sold over 2000 yeast tanks, 500 breweries to more than 600 customers which is a mix of breweries, wineries and distilleries in over 70 countries on all continents of the world . Everything from 100L to 20 000L, manual or full auto.

We make your tanks and brewhouses at your premises at no extra cost.
We can also help develop a complete brewery with everything from malt crusher to cooling system.

Through our partners, we can also help with installation if you are looking for a turn-key solution.

We can also help with financing. Monroe Stainless Sweden is a Swedish company with F-tax and VAT registration.
We do help and cover  customs and shipment for  all international orders. Contact us for more information.

"We can produce everything except nuclear weapons."

Tanks

We can produce pressure tanks, fermentation tanks, combined tanks, carbon dioxide tanks, horizontal tanks, serving tanks, milk tanks, tanks for wine fermentation - everything you are looking for.

READ MORE...
Brewhouse

All breweries are delivered with twice as large HLT. Choose between immersion heater or steam.

Choose between Siemens PLC, full auto or manual control.

READ MORE...
CIP

Completely in stainless steel and powerful pumps, we can produce 2 or 3 vessel CIP stations, stationary or on wheels in heavy construction in all sizes. Manual or automatic - you choose.

READ MORE...
Complete Brewery

MONROE STAINLESS is happy to help develop an entire brewery, we have extensive experience from starting from scratch to upgrading existing brewing equipment.

READ MORE...
Tapping Equipment

Cans, bottle, PET or bag in box? We help with all kinds of tapping equipment in all sizes. We work with reputable brands from the USA, Canada, Germany and Italy to find exactly your match.

READ MORE...
Used Equipment

Monroe both buys and sells used equipment.


READ MORE...

why MONROE STAINLESS

Monroe Stainless was started by former brewers and is for brewers mainly, although we have manufactured tanks for wine, milk, cider, mead - everything possible. We work all over the world with different partners. Monroe Stainless Sweden has F-tax, VAT registration and can help with leasing / financing.

item.title: tankar_eng
item.dc:creator: jenny_ha2h3jpn
item.content:encoded:
TANKS

[modula id="2678"]


Since we optimize each shipment, our tanks are often cheaper than the used ones on the Swedish market, even though we deliver high quality.

We can produce pressure tanks, fermentation tanks, combined tanks, carbondioxide tanks, horizontal tanks, serving tanks, milk tanks, tanks for wine fermentation - everything and anything you are looking for.

  • CE-marked
  • 30% extra headspace
  • Insulated from polyurethane, 100mm
  • SU304, 3mm inside & 2mm outside
  • CIP-ball
  • 60° cone angle
  • Cooling jacket with one or two cooling zones depending on tank size
  • 4” hop gate at the top
  • Manhole at the side or at the top topp
  • Working pressure: 2 bar

Included:
Our yeast tanks will be complete, passivated and ready to use. Carbondioxide residue, rotatable rack arm, adjustable spun valve, pressure relief valve, test valve and solenoid valve (solenoid) for cooling media.

We can build tanks narrower, wider, higher, lower to suit your premises and needs.
Weight and dimensions are shown in the diagrams on each tank.

CONTACT US FOR MORE info
